thread.title: Demi Lovato and Nick Jonas team up for tour

author: chron.com
title: Demi Lovato and Nick Jonas team up for tour
text:

Sept. 9 Demi Lovato and Nick Jonas: Longtime friends team up for Future Now: The Tour at Toyota Center. Photo: Kevin Mazur/Fox, WireImage Image 19 of 19 Demi Lovato and Nick Jonas team up for tour 1 / 19 Back to Gallery The future is now for Demi Lovato and Nick Jonas. And next September, when it comes to Houston.
The Texas-bred pop duo, who both hail from Dallas, team up for Future Now: The Tour. The 40-plus cities include a Sept. 9 stop at Toyota Center. Tickets go on sale Nov. 7 via houstontoyotacenter.com.
Jonas is rumored to have replaced Adam Lambert , who performs Wednesday at Bayou Music Center.
RELATED: A confident Nick Jonas thrills Houston audience
Lovato released her fifth album, "Confident," this month. It's expected to debut atop the Billboard 200 this week. The action-packed video for the title track was directed by Texas native Robert Rodriguez and co-stars Michelle Rodriguez.
Jonas visited Houston in September for a show at House of Blues . He has a starring role in mixed-martial-arts drama "Kingdom" and a role in the high-profile "Scream Queens."
This isn't the first Lovato-Jonas road pairing. They performed in 2010 at RodeoHouston. Here's hoping for a "Camp Rock" duet.
